1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Subtext match expression.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Subtext.Expr
6 ( Expr (..),
7   ExprRec (..),
8   ExprBase (..),
9   FnElem, FnSpan, FnInter, FnAs,
10 ) where
11
12import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Overture.Fn     as O
13import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Subtext.MinMax  as T
14
15
16-- | Subtext match expression.
17data Expr a
18  = ERec  (ExprRec a)          -- ^ Recursive expression
19  | EBase (ExprBase a)         -- ^ Non-recursive expression
20    deriving (Show, Eq, Ord)
21
22-- | Recursive expression.
23data ExprRec a
24  = EOr           [Expr a]     -- ^ Alternative match
25  | ESeq          [Expr a]     -- ^ Sequential match
26  | EAnd          [Expr a]     -- ^ Additional condition
27  | ENot          (Expr a)     -- ^ Inverted condition
28  | ERep T.MinMax (Expr a)     -- ^ Repetitive match
29  | ELast         (Expr a)     -- ^ Find last match
30  | ESub  O.Name  (Expr a)     -- ^ Submatch
31  | EAs (FnAs a)  (Expr a)     -- ^ Modification matcher
32  | EGath Bool    (Expr a)     -- ^ Change gathering setting
33    deriving (Show, Eq, Ord)
34
35-- | Non-recursive expression.
36data ExprBase a
37  = EElem  (FnElem a)          -- ^ Element matcher
38  | ESpan  (FnSpan a)          -- ^ Spanning (multi-element) matcher
39  | EInter (FnInter a)         -- ^ Inter-element matcher
40  | EChange O.Name             -- ^ Change to other expression
41  | EAlways Bool               -- ^ Immediate match/unmatch
42  | EWhat                      -- ^ Context-dependent match
43    deriving (Show, Eq, Ord)
44
45-- | Function type for element matcher.
46type FnElem a = O.Fn a Bool
47
48-- | Function type for spanning matcher.
49type FnSpan a = O.Fn [a] (Maybe ([a], [a]))
50
51-- | Function type for inter-element matcher.
52type FnInter a = O.Fn2 (Maybe a) (Maybe a) Bool
53
54-- | Function type for modification matcher.
55type FnAs a = O.Fn [a] [a]
56
